data.message: Shame you didn't let the BBC film your set........AGAIN!!!

replies.message: Couldn't agree more but I will be on you tube tomorrow 😂😂

Why doesn't he let them?
Not that I care as I was at reading and he was fucking awsome
Bbc want him to tone his set down for their audience.. I'm glad he sticks the middle finger up to them.
Aaron Parsons  I don't know if that's correct?? As I watched iplayer this afternoon & there are quite a few artist sets which haven't been toned down
Why should he have to show it on tv,we and other people paid good money to see him there live so if you want to watch him that bad next time pay and see him in reading or Leeds that simple really!

Melissa Hills FYI....I did have tickets to go but unfortunately due to personal circumstances I couldn't go & had to sell my tickets!! 
Some people cannot afford tickets or like myself have to change their plans & the only way they can see it is to watch it on iplayer.
If other bands can be televised, why can't he?? 
It was a simple statement I made - with quite a few people agreeing, & I certainly didn't expect to be verbally attacked for doing so.........maybe you should think before you reply!!
